title: Border
medium: Block-printed and flocked on handmade ppaer
description: Top band of floral and foliatte, central band of rope twist with acanthus and floral motifs, bottom band of dentil. Printed in orange flock with overprinting, 2 shades of yellow and brown on grisaille foliate and blue-striped ground paper. Zuber ?
name: Border
